mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CP.PT_THUMBNAIL, CP.PT_CONTENT, CP.PT_TITLE, CP.PT_NO, CP.PT_DESIGN, CP.PT_CONSTRUCTION, CP.PT_LAND_AREA, CP.PT_BUILDING_AREA, CP.PT_TOTAL_FLOOR_AREA, CP.PT_FLOOR_NUM, CP.PT_HOUSEHOLD_NUM, CP.PT_COMPLETION_YEAR, CP.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) AS RN FROM COMPANY_PROJECT CP JOIN USERS U ON CP.USER_ID = U.USER_ID ) WHERE RN <= #{limit}
